events.message: I received the laptop yesterday, but the screen has a huge scratch and the keyboard keys feel faulty. This is very disappointing.
The customer's issue has been categorized as a product defect based on the description of the damaged screen and faulty keyboard keys.
The case has been assigned to an available support agent specialized in hardware defects for prompt assistance.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the damage to your laptop. I’m here to help resolve this issue quickly for you.
Could you please provide photos of the scratched screen and the keyboard? This will help us assess the defect more accurately.
I have attached clear photos showing the screen scratch and the worn-out keys. The device was handled carefully during shipping.
Thanks for the photos. We can proceed by sending a replacement laptop to you at no extra cost or offer a full refund if you prefer.
I would prefer a replacement laptop as soon as possible. Thank you for the quick response and helpful options.
We have processed the replacement order and you will receive tracking details shortly. Thank you for your patience.
Just checking in to confirm you received your replacement laptop and that everything is working well. Let us know if you need further assistance.
